verbs.description: Vice - president Mike Pence [V: has] repeatedly praised the broad shoulders of President Donald Trump and other men . Now Pence is putting his pro - shoulder beliefs into action .

[ARG0: Vice - president Mike Pence] has [ARGM-MNR: repeatedly] [V: praised] [ARG1: the broad shoulders of President Donald Trump and other men] . Now Pence is putting his pro - shoulder beliefs into action .
Vice - president Mike Pence has repeatedly praised the broad shoulders of President Donald Trump and other men . Now Pence [V: is] putting his pro - shoulder beliefs into action .

Vice - president Mike Pence has repeatedly praised the broad shoulders of President Donald Trump and other men . [ARGM-TMP: Now] [ARG0: Pence] is [V: putting] [ARG1: his pro - shoulder beliefs] [ARG2: into action] .
